TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DataObjectCopyingEventHandler(object sender, DataObjectCopyingEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed DataObjectCopyingEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub DataObjectCopyingEventHandler(sender As Object, e As DataObjectCopyingEventArgs)
public delegate void DataObjectCopyingEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, DataObjectCopyingEventArgs ^ e);

param.name: sender
param.span: 附加事件處理常式的物件。

span.span: The object where the event handler is attached.

summary.span: 表示將處理 附加事件的方法。

span.span: Represents a method that will handle the attached event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 附加的事件發生時複製作業已完成將選取的內容轉換為所有指定的資料格式、 已儲存在相關聯的資料物件中的所有資料格式或已經將系統剪貼簿的資料物件上，或開始拖曳作業。The attached event occurs when a copy operation has finished converting the selected content into all specified data formats, has stored all data formats in the associated data object, and is ready to put the data object on the system clipboard or to begin a drag operation. A附加的事件處理常式方法通常會檢查做為事件引數，傳遞的資料物件的內容，並執行資料物件，例如加入、 移除或修改資料格式的自訂作業。A attached event handler method typically inspects the contents of the data object passed in as an event argument, and performs custom operations on the data object, such as adding, removing, or modifying data formats. 此處理常式方法也可以藉由呼叫取消複製事件。This handler method may also cancel the copying event by calling .
